dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

square.desc: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

flat.desc_cn: 应用“平面”设计（无默认阴影）

bordered.desc: Applies a default border to the component
bordered.desc_cn: 将默认边框应用于组件

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component
default.desc_cn: 组件的devland unslotted内容中的默认插槽
